event.name: NoConnectionToServer
event.format_string: Unable to connect to the socket server on port %d
event.comment: The thread will try to re-connect until a connection is made

arg.name: PortNumber
arg.comment: The port number running the socket server

event.name: ConnectedToServer
event.format_string: Connection made to the socket server on port %d
event.comment: The socket thread will continuously read until disconnected or terminated

arg.name: PortNumber
arg.comment: The port number running the socket server

event.name: LostConnectionToServer
event.format_string: Connection lost with socket server on port %d
event.comment: The socket thread will continuously try to reconnect to socket server if connection dropped by server

arg.name: PortNumber
arg.comment: The port number running the socket server
